transArray.content: The girl at the front desk, Snail Rice Noodles, is very welcoming. The room is clean and quiet. I will choose it again next time I come to Beijing.

A city, two people, a beautiful memory. Thank you for meeting you at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel, and thank you even more for your recognition of us. We always believe that good reputation and service must be spread from your satisfaction. At the same time, we are honored to provide you with high-quality Service, all the hotel staff are encouraged by your positive comments, and we are constantly working hard to give you a better stay experience next time. wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhang Minghui
